title: Take a deep Breath, Stretch, and Smile -Celebrating Social Wellness Month with a Heartwarming Puppy Yoga at The PARQ
text:
The PARQ, the lifestyle mixed-use destination on Rama IV Road, recently celebrated Social Wellness Month by inviting city dwellers to pause, recharge, and reconnect with themselves through an uplifting Puppy Yoga, held in collaboration with Mind Over Matters on Saturday, July 19th, 2025, at BAB Café, Level 3, The PARQ Life. The event reflected its [ ]
The post Take a deep Breath, Stretch, and Smile –Celebrating Social Wellness Month with a Heartwarming Puppy Yoga at The PARQ appeared first on ThaiPR.NET.
